article_title: Coachella 2015: Gorgon City Dish on Working With Pete Tong, Next Single & More
article_text:
Gorgon City has had a pretty "intense" year -- and it doesn't look like things will be slowing down anytime soon.

Full Coachella Coverage

In addition to their appearance at Coachella 2015, the British production duo is planning to release a new single this summer and have started working on their next album.



Gorgon City paid a visit to the Billboard studio at Coachella to discuss those topics, along with their journey over the past year of translating their dance album into a live show and working with Pete Tong. Watch below.
